description.p: Join, create and manage Hamachi networks in a breeze.
Features:

ul.li: Searchable, sortable and collapsible network list
Sidebar for easy access to details and actions
Desktop notifications
Fully customizable commands
Backup and restore your Hamachi configuration folder

description.p: Please note: Requires installation of Hamachi on the system in order to use.
Xúnite, crea y xestiona redes Hamachi con cenciellez
Carauterístiques:

ul.li: Llista de redes espandible, que se pue ordenar y onde se pue guetar
Barra llateral p'acceder fácilmente a los detalles y les aiciones
Avisos d'escritoriu
Comandos personalizables dafechu
Fai copies de seguranza y restaura la carpeta de configuración de Hamachi

description.p: Присъединявайте се, създавайте и управлявайте Hamachi мрежи с лекота.
Характеристики:

ul.li: Търсим, подреждащ се и сгъваем списък с мрежи
Страничен панел за лесен достъп до детайли и действия
Известия на работния плот
Напълно персонализиращи се команди
Бекъп и възстановяване на вашата Hamachi директория

description.p: Cree, gestione y únase a redes Hamachi al instante.
Prestaciones:

ul.li: Organice, contraiga y filtre la lista de redes
Barra lateral para un fácil acceso a los detalles y las acciones
Notificaciones de escritorio
Órdenes completamente personalizables
Respalde y restaure la carpeta de configuración de Hamachi

description.p: Rejoignez, créez et gérez les réseaux Hamachi en un rien de temps.
Fonctionnalités :

ul.li: liste de réseau consultable et triable ;
barre latérale pour un accès facile aux détails et aux actions ;
notifications de bureau ;
commandes entièrement personnalisables ;
sauvegarde et restauration de votre dossier de configuration Hamachi.

description.p: Bergabung, membuat dan mengelola jaringan Hamachi dengan mudah.
Fitur:

ul.li: Senarai Jaringan yang dapat ditelusuri, diurutkan dan diciutkan
Bilah samping untuk memudahkan akses ke detail dan tindakan
Notifikasi destop
Perintah yang sepenuhnya dapat disesuaikan
Cadangkan dan simpang ulang pelipat konfigurasi Hamachi anda

description.p: Aggiungi, crea e gestisci le reti Hamachi in un batter d'occhio.
Funzionalità:

ul.li: Cerca, ordina e compatta la lista delle reti
Barra laterale per l'accesso a dettagli e azioni
Notifiche desktop
Comandi totalmente personalizzabili
Salva e ripristina la tua cartella della configurazione di Hamachi

description.p: 簡単に Hamachi ネットワークに参加したり、作成したり、管理したりしましょう。
機能:

ul.li: 検索・並べ替え・折りたたみ可能なネットワークリスト
詳細やアクションに簡単にアクセスできるサイドバー
デスクトップ通知
十分にカスタマイズ可能なコマンド
Hamachi 設定フォルダーをバックアップし復元できます

description.p: ご注意ください: このアプリを使用するには、システムに Hamachi をインストールする必要があります。
Lengvai prisijunkite, kurkite ir tvarkykite Hamachi tinklus.
Ypatybės:

ul.li: Randamas, rikiuojamas ir suskleidžiamas tinklų sąrašas
Šoninė juosta, skirta lengvai prieigai prie išsamesnės informacijos ir veiksmų
Darbalaukio pranešimai
Pilnai tinkinamos komandos
Galimybė daryti savo Hamachi konfigūracijos aplanko atsarginę kopiją ir ją atkurti

description.p: Maak, treed toe en beheer Hamachi netwerken in een handomdraai.
Eigenschappen:

ul.li: Doorzoekbare, sorteerbare en inklapbare netwerklijst
Zijbalk voor snelle toegang tot info and acties
Bureaubladnotificaties
Volledig aanpasbare opdrachten
Backup en herstel uw Hamachi configuratiemap

description.p: Let op: Vereist installatie van Hamachi op het systeem om volledig te kunnen gebruiken.
Łatwe dołączanie, tworzenie i zarządzanie sieciami Hamachi.
Funkcje:

ul.li: Lista sieci, którą można przeszukiwać, porządkować i zwijać
Panel boczny z łatwym dostępem do informacji i działań
Powiadomienia na pulpicie
W pełni konfigurowalne polecenia
Tworzenie kopii zapasowej i przywracanie katalogu z konfiguracją Hamachi

description.p: Proszę zauważyć: do użycia wymagana jest instalacja programu Hamachi na komputerze.
Junte-se, crie e administre redes Hamachi facilmente.
Funcionalidades:

ul.li: Lista de redes com pesquisa, ordenação e agrupamento
Barra lateral para um acesso fácil aos detalhes e ações
Notificações no ambiente de trabalho
Comandos completamente personalizáveis
Faça uma cópia de segurança para restaurar a sua pasta de configuração do Hamachi

description.p: Nota: É necessária a instalação do Hamachi no sistema para ser usado.
Acesse, crie e gerencie suas redes Hamachi com facilidade
Funcionalidades:

ul.li: Lista de redes com busca, ordenação e agrupamento
Barra lateral para acesso fácil aos detalhes e ações
Notificações da área de trabalho
Comandos totalmente customizáveis
Faça backup e restaure sua pasta de configuração do Hamachi

description.p: Присоединяйтесь, создавайте и управляйте сетями Hamachi на одном дыхании.
Возможности:

ul.li: Список сетей с возможностью поиска, сортировки и складывания
Боковая панель для быстрого доступа к деталям и действиям
Уведомления на рабочем столе
Полностью настраиваемые команды
Создать резервную копию и восстановить вашу папку конфигурации Hamachi

description.p: Важно: Для использования необходим установленный Hamachi
Gå med, skapa och hantera Hamachi-nätverk enkelt.
Funktioner:

ul.li: Sökbar, sorterbar och utfällbar nätverkslista
Sidorad för enkel åtkomst till information och åtgärder
Skrivbordsnotifieringar
Fullt anpassningsbara kommandon
Säkerhetskopiera och återskapa din konfigurationsmapp för Hamachi

description.p: Приєднуйся, створюй та керуй мережею Hamachi.
Можливості:

ul.li: Список мереж з можливістю пошуку, сортування, складання
Бічна панель для швидкого доступу до деталей та дій
Сповіщення
Повністю настроювані команди
Резервне копіювання та відновлення каталогу з налаштуваннями Hamachi

description.p: Зверніть увагу: Для використання, Hamachi має бути встановленно

component.summary: Uma interface gráfica para o Hamachi
Uma interface gráfica para o Hamachi
Hamachi 用のグラフィカルフロントエンド

description.p: Haguichi 1.4.5 is gifted with the following changes:

ul.li: Notifications are now send using GNotification instead of libnotify (fixes issue #47).
Removed support for upstart to control the Hamachi service.
Switch to show indicator is now disabled if there is no connection to a watcher.
Now using the RDNN com.github.ztefn.haguichi as prefix for the indicator icons.
Ported wingpanel indicator to version 3.
Updated elementary stylesheet to target version 6.
Updated Japanese and Russian translations.
Other minor fixes and improvements.

description.p: Haguichi 1.4.4 has undergone a small spring cleanup and is ready to face the world:

ul.li: Added build support for libayatana-indicator as alternative to libappindicator (fixes issue #39).
Added invisible tooltips to action buttons in headerbar for screen readers and applications like Plotinus.
Tweaked action area margins for dialogs without headerbar.
Added Control+? accelerator for opening the shortcuts window.
Retired application menu and reorganized the primary menu to follow GNOME HIG.
Improved init system detection for systemctl by checking if the system has actually been booted with systemd (fixes issues #35 and #36).
Dropped support for gksu(do), gnomesu and kdesu(do) to gain super user privileges.
Removed dconf migration for settings in old schema location.
Fixed build warnings about deprecated methods and error handling.
Updated Ukrainian translation.

description.p: Haguichi 1.4.3 has emerged to deliver a compilation of little fixes and tweaks:

ul.li: Fixed search entry leaving out the trigger character when activated by typing for the first time.
Added fallback method to detect if Hamachi configuration path exists when running inside a Flatpak sandbox while the path is not yet mounted.
Added symlinks to hicolor status icons in Yaru theme in order to prevent the indicator from falling back to the application icon.
Moved symbolic application icons for hicolor theme to a more specific folder to make sure they are rendered properly.
Symbolic icons are now used for the indicator on Cinnamon desktops.
Client side decorations are now used on MATE desktops.
Removed "Donate" menu item due to little use.
Translator credits are now part of the translations themselves.
Added complete Portuguese translation (thanks to André Barata).
Updated Dutch and Polish translations.

description.p: Haguichi 1.4.2 is made up of the following list. Which has been checked twice:

ul.li: Implemented FileChooserNative for GTK+ version 3.20 and later.
Updated hicolor icons to follow the new GNOME style.
Added Yaru icons in new non-squircle style (big thanks to ubuntujaggers).
Nodes are now drawn using a custom cell renderer with specific style context instead of separate icon resources.
Changed symbol to indicate network ownership from outlined to filled star.
Added support for tilix.
Added stylesheet for Mint themes.
Added stylesheet for Yaru themes.
Added support for Flatpak.
Removed autostart desktop file.
Updated Russian translation.
Other minor improvements and optimizations.

description.p: Haguichi 1.4.1 has embarked on a great journey packing the following changes:

ul.li: Initialization is now completely multi-threaded.
Now using a thread pool for determining network ownership and retreiving long nicks.
Made improvements to configuring and restarting the Hamachi service (fixes issue #16).
Made network properties extraction more robust.
Added wingpanel integration as build option.
Added support for io.elementary.files and io.elementary.terminal.
Added support for using the Delete key to trigger delete, leave and evict actions.
Custom command buttons and menu items that don't use the %A address variable are not shown greyed out anymore for members that are offline.
Client side decorations are now used on LXQt desktops.
Updated elementary stylesheets for Juno release.
Added specific application icons for elementary OS.
Node icons are now included as resources instead of installed into hicolor icon theme.
Suru icons for Ubuntu are now installed in /usr/share/icons/Yaru.
AppData XML and .desktop files are now completely translatable (fixes bug #1753846).
Updated Asturian, Brazilian Portuguese, Bulgarian, Dutch, French, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Lithuanian, Polish, Spanish, Swedish and Ukrainian translations.
Other minor fixes, improvements and optimizations.

description.p: Haguichi 1.4.0 has washed ashore carrying bulk of new features and updates:

ul.li: Implemented shortcuts window for GTK+ version 3.20 and later.
Revamped preferences dialog using stack, list box and switch widgets.
Integrated appindicator as build option and added accompanying switch to preferences dialog.
Added dark theme switch to preferences dialog (only available when client side decorations are used).
Added Suru application icons for Ubuntu (big thanks to Sam Hewitt).
Tweaked sidebar content alignment and margins.
Improved window position and size handling.
Improved modal dialog management.
Improved compatibility with GTK+ 3.20 and 3.22.
Fixed crash that could occur when adding a network while the network list was being filtered.
Now using stylesheets to implement theme specific tweaks and fixes.
Now using the RDNN com.github.ztefn.haguichi for .desktop files, GSettings schema and D-Bus name.
Updated Brazilian Portuguese, Bulgarian, Czech, Dutch, French, Italian, Polish, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish and Ukrainian translations.
Bumped minimum required versions of Vala (0.30), GLib (2.48) and GTK+ (3.18).
Other minor fixes, improvements and optimizations.
